messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

      "content": "Security Audit (SEC) - Project Milestones

Planning milestone: 10 Nov 2025
Development milestone: 20 Nov 2025
Launch milestone: 30 Nov 2025

Overview
This document outlines the key milestones, owners, and high‚Äëlevel scope for the Security Audit initiative.

Milestones
1. Planning (10 Nov 2025)
   - Finalize scope for SEC-100, SEC-101 and related tasks.
   - Confirm cross‚Äëteam dependencies with Operations.
2. Development (20 Nov 2025)
   - Complete implementation of the Security Audit core feature (SEC-101).
3. Launch (30 Nov 2025)
   - Production rollout of Security Audit core feature.",

      "content": "Security Audit - Planning Sync (45 minutes)
Date: Tue 4 Nov 2025
Time: 2:00pm‚Äì2:45pm AEDT
Location: Zoom (https://zoom.company.com/j/987654321)

Attendees
- Alex Smith (PM, R&D)
- Jordan Johnson (Engineer, Operations)
- Sam Williams (Senior Engineer, R&D)

Agenda
1. Review SEC milestones (Planning 10 Nov, Development 20 Nov, Launch 30 Nov)
2. Dependencies between R&D and Operations
3. Risks, owners, and next steps

Discussion & Notes
- Confirmed overall Security Audit (SEC) timeline.
- SEC-101 ("Security Audit - Core Feature") is the main scope item for the Launch milestone (30 Nov 2025).
- Ops dependencies: Jordan to review logging, alerting and runbook changes required for Security Audit.

Decisions
- Planning milestone remains 10 Nov 2025.
- Development milestone remains 20 Nov 2025.
- Launch milestone remains 30 Nov 2025, including rollout of SEC-101.

Action Items
- Jordan: Provide Operations impact assessment by 7 Nov 2025.
- Sam: Review SEC-101 implementation details and confirm dev completion date.
- Alex: Create JIRA tickets under SEC project for all action items and link to SEC-101 where appropriate.

References
- JIRA project: SEC
- Key issues: SEC-100 (Initial Setup), SEC-101 (Security Audit - Core Feature)
- Milestone overview: SEC_Project_Milestones.pdf",

      "id": "doc_SEC_101_Feature_Spec",
      "name": "SEC-101 - Security Audit Core Feature - Functional Spec",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "content": "JIRA Issue: SEC-101
Title: Security Audit - Core Feature

1. Overview
The Security Audit core feature provides centralized visibility into security‚Äërelevant events for enterprise customers (e.g., Contoso Ltd). This document describes the functional requirements and planned release details for SEC-101.

2. Scope
- Collection and aggregation of security events.
- Role‚Äëbased access to audit logs.
- Export capability for compliance reporting.

3. Milestones and ETA
- Development complete: ~22 Nov 2025
- Testing and security hardening: ~23‚Äì29 Nov 2025
- Production rollout (ETA): 30 Nov 2025 (aligned with Security Audit Launch milestone).

4. Dependencies
- SEC-100 (Initial Setup)
- Operations runbook updates (Jordan Johnson)

5. Customer Notes
- High priority for enterprise customer Contoso Ltd.
- Communicated ETA: 30 November 2025 for production availability, assuming no major blockers.",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-05T10:18:00+11:00"
    },

      "content": "Subject: ETA for Security Audit core feature (SEC-101)

Customer: Contoso Ltd
JIRA: SEC-101 "Security Audit - Core Feature"

Summary
The Security Audit core feature (SEC-101) is currently on track for production release with the Security Audit Launch milestone.

Planned timeline
- Development complete: around 22 November 2025.
- Testing & security hardening: following week (approximately 23‚Äì29 November 2025).
- Production rollout ETA: 30 November 2025.

Notes
- Customer impact: High.
- Any major blockers will be communicated immediately via Customer Success.

This draft is used by Alex Smith to respond to Customer Success (Mia) regarding Contoso‚Äôs inquiry.",
